title: Peace Corps in the Majya
brief_description: Depicts the work of four Peace Corps volunteers in the Majya Valley of the Niger River. The two young men are an agricultural co-op specialist and a teacher. The young women are public health workers teaching Nigerian mothers to prevent infant mortality. Narrated by George Peppard.
